title: John B. Heywood (photographer)
content:
John Brooks Heywood (August 8, 1825 â€“ ) was an American photographer who worked in Boston, Massachusetts, c. 1856-1861.[1][2][3] Examples of his photographs reside in the New York Public Library[4] and the Massachusetts Historical Society.[citation needed]

Heywood was born in Shrewsbury, Massachusetts, to 	
Daniel Heywood and Maria Brooks.[5] In 1849, he married Mary Russell Andrews.

This article about an American photographer is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
